story.headline: Steve Jobs takes $1 salary again
story.summary: Apple posted in their most recent annual report that Apple CEO Steve Jobs has received just $1 salary
story.body: Apple posted in their most recent annual report that Apple CEO Steve Jobs has received just $1 salary - the same amount as the past 2 years. He also got 10 million shares which if he sold at todays stock price would be worth around $848,400,000.00. Not bad for a years work…
